entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as the owner of a wand with remarkable effects.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who asked about Lucius Malfoy's wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who was able to break Lucius Malfoy's wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who had tampered with magic and was targeted by Lucius Malfoy's wand.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who explained the properties of Lucius Malfoy's wand.

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy's wand was directed only at Voldemort, who had tampered with magic.
Harry asked about Lucius Malfoy's stand and his wand.
Hermione was able to break Lucius Malfoy's wand.
Dumbledore explained the properties of Lucius Malfoy's wand.
